pr_title: Application context path can not end with a slash

timeline.bodyText:
suggested edit:
The {0} context root path of the {1} application cannot end with a slash ( / ).
timeline.author: dmuelle
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -1614,3 +1614,9 @@ duplicate.samesite.attribute.for.cookie.name.useraction=Check the deployment des
 duplicate.reported.for.samesite.attribute.cookie.name=CWWWC0004W: A {0} cookie name that is configured for the {1} SameSite attribute value was previously identified as a duplicate. No SameSite attribute is added for this cookie.
 duplicate.reported.for.samesite.attribute.cookie.name.explanation=A cookie name cannot be configured for multiple SameSite attribute values. This cookie name has already been identified as a duplicate.
 duplicate.reported.for.samesite.attribute.cookie.name.useraction=Check the deployment descriptor configuration to make sure the cookie name is configured for only one of the following SameSite attribute values: 'SameSiteCookies_Lax', 'SameSiteCookies_None', or 'SameSiteCookies_Strict'. 
+
+# {0} context root that has an invalid ending slash
+# {1} application name
+context.root.can.not.end.with.slash=CWWWC0005W: The {0} context root of the application {1} can not end with a slash.

timeline.bodyText:
Suggested edit:
The context root path of the application starts with a slash ( / ) but cannot end with a slash.
timeline.author: dmuelle
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -1614,3 +1614,9 @@ duplicate.samesite.attribute.for.cookie.name.useraction=Check the deployment des
 duplicate.reported.for.samesite.attribute.cookie.name=CWWWC0004W: A {0} cookie name that is configured for the {1} SameSite attribute value was previously identified as a duplicate. No SameSite attribute is added for this cookie.
 duplicate.reported.for.samesite.attribute.cookie.name.explanation=A cookie name cannot be configured for multiple SameSite attribute values. This cookie name has already been identified as a duplicate.
 duplicate.reported.for.samesite.attribute.cookie.name.useraction=Check the deployment descriptor configuration to make sure the cookie name is configured for only one of the following SameSite attribute values: 'SameSiteCookies_Lax', 'SameSiteCookies_None', or 'SameSiteCookies_Strict'. 
+
+# {0} context root that has an invalid ending slash
+# {1} application name
+context.root.can.not.end.with.slash=CWWWC0005W: The {0} context root of the application {1} can not end with a slash.
+context.root.can.not.end.with.slash.explanation=The context root path starts with a '/' character but does not end with a '/' character.

replies.bodyText: It would be better if the explanation can say why the root path can't end in a slash
replies.author: dmuelle

timeline.bodyText:
Suggested edit:
Remove the slash ( / ) at the end of the context root path.
timeline.author: dmuelle
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -1614,3 +1614,9 @@ duplicate.samesite.attribute.for.cookie.name.useraction=Check the deployment des
 duplicate.reported.for.samesite.attribute.cookie.name=CWWWC0004W: A {0} cookie name that is configured for the {1} SameSite attribute value was previously identified as a duplicate. No SameSite attribute is added for this cookie.
 duplicate.reported.for.samesite.attribute.cookie.name.explanation=A cookie name cannot be configured for multiple SameSite attribute values. This cookie name has already been identified as a duplicate.
 duplicate.reported.for.samesite.attribute.cookie.name.useraction=Check the deployment descriptor configuration to make sure the cookie name is configured for only one of the following SameSite attribute values: 'SameSiteCookies_Lax', 'SameSiteCookies_None', or 'SameSiteCookies_Strict'. 
+
+# {0} context root that has an invalid ending slash
+# {1} application name
+context.root.can.not.end.with.slash=CWWWC0005W: The {0} context root of the application {1} can not end with a slash.
+context.root.can.not.end.with.slash.explanation=The context root path starts with a '/' character but does not end with a '/' character.
+context.root.can.not.end.with.slash.useraction=Remove the ending '/' of the application's context root.

replies.bodyText: I think this last one still needs an edit. Let me know if there are problems with my previous suggestion and I can revise if needed
replies.author: dmuelle

timeline.bodyText:
suggested edit
change
The {0} context root of the {1} application can not end with a slash (/).
To
The {0} context root of the {1} application cannot end with a slash (/).
timeline.author: dmuelle
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -1614,3 +1614,9 @@ duplicate.samesite.attribute.for.cookie.name.useraction=Check the deployment des
 duplicate.reported.for.samesite.attribute.cookie.name=CWWWC0004W: A {0} cookie name that is configured for the {1} SameSite attribute value was previously identified as a duplicate. No SameSite attribute is added for this cookie.
 duplicate.reported.for.samesite.attribute.cookie.name.explanation=A cookie name cannot be configured for multiple SameSite attribute values. This cookie name has already been identified as a duplicate.
 duplicate.reported.for.samesite.attribute.cookie.name.useraction=Check the deployment descriptor configuration to make sure the cookie name is configured for only one of the following SameSite attribute values: 'SameSiteCookies_Lax', 'SameSiteCookies_None', or 'SameSiteCookies_Strict'. 
+
+# {0} context root that has an invalid ending slash
+# {1} application name
+context.root.can.not.end.with.slash=CWWWC0005W: The {0} context root of the {1} application can not end with a slash (/).

timeline.bodyText: In this explanation- what is "the servlet doc"? Is it the servlet specification? Or the API documentation?
timeline.author: dmuelle
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -1614,3 +1614,9 @@ duplicate.samesite.attribute.for.cookie.name.useraction=Check the deployment des
 duplicate.reported.for.samesite.attribute.cookie.name=CWWWC0004W: A {0} cookie name that is configured for the {1} SameSite attribute value was previously identified as a duplicate. No SameSite attribute is added for this cookie.
 duplicate.reported.for.samesite.attribute.cookie.name.explanation=A cookie name cannot be configured for multiple SameSite attribute values. This cookie name has already been identified as a duplicate.
 duplicate.reported.for.samesite.attribute.cookie.name.useraction=Check the deployment descriptor configuration to make sure the cookie name is configured for only one of the following SameSite attribute values: 'SameSiteCookies_Lax', 'SameSiteCookies_None', or 'SameSiteCookies_Strict'. 
+
+# {0} context root that has an invalid ending slash
+# {1} application name
+context.root.can.not.end.with.slash=CWWWC0005W: The {0} context root of the {1} application can not end with a slash (/).
+context.root.can.not.end.with.slash.explanation=According to the servlet doc, the context root path of the application starts with a slash (/) but cannot end with a slash.
